titles.title: Condemning the attempted assassination of former President Donald J. Trump at the Trump International Golf Club in West Palm Beach, Florida, and honoring the Martin County Sheriff's Office for their rapid response and bravery in apprehending the would-be assassin.

Condemning the attempted assassination of former President Donald J. Trump at the Trump International Golf Club in West Palm Beach, Florida, and honoring the Martin County Sheriff's Office for their rapid response and bravery in apprehending the would-be assassin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
